I was on CNN this morning talking about the dangerous situation Donald Trump has created in Iran and the serious threat to national security he’s creating by not beginning the transition with President-elect Biden. https://t.co/Iqt0GAKXvs
Congratulations to @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris and thank you to the millions of volunteers around the country who made this victory possible.
Congrats to my 3 amazing colleagues on their re-elections! https://t.co/IHCjxBjs45
Congrats to @MarkWarnerVA on his re-election!
It’s not too late to make a difference this election. Can you take an hour to call folks who haven’t voted yet and remind them? https://t.co/UrL6DaOtEN https://t.co/oBWO8LBmTz

Polls in Virginia are open! If you didn’t vote early go to https://t.co/3SBP22Tbba to find your polling place. Remember: if you have not returned your absentee ballot there will be a dropbox at your polling location to return it.
Over 200 volunteers on our textbank reminding Virginians to vote tomorrow! It’s not too late to signup to volunteer: https://t.co/rtOhuZ7YDE https://t.co/SsA1eo8npQ

Launching a socially distant canvass as my 25th event for @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris. Rain couldn’t keep these volunteers away from going out to deliver a decisive victory for our ticket. https://t.co/smZF4EHbVF

It’s the last day to #VoteEarly in person in VA. Locations are open across the commonwealth to vote early or return your absentee ballot at a Dropbox. Find your nearest location at https://t.co/THIkZ5Sbzj.
There are only two more days to early vote in Virginia. Find your nearest location at https://t.co/3SBP22Tbba. Still have your absentee ballot? You can find your closest dropbox there too!

Helping launch the @JoeBiden African Diaspora Phone Bank. We have six days to end the horror of the Trump administration and elect a decent man to the Oval Office. Do your part by volunteering to GOTV either from home or contactless canvassing: https://t.co/KZhOonKe6H https://t.co/PPLBv0TKGE
Kicking off another virtual phone bank with ⁦⁦@JCarrollFoy⁩ . It’s not too late to sign up and make calls am to remind people across VA to vote! https://t.co/nYGmd8bf3d https://t.co/In0tsqlMI2

Thanks to @EFillerCorn for joining us for a combined Sturdivant Awards and Diwali celebration. Congrats to @IlryongMoon @seloniamiles Ellen Pence and Ron Kuley for winning their awards and everything they do to elect Democrats. Great work by @VA11Dems! https://t.co/Xa3jyYOHXa
One year ago today. Trump STILL doesn’t have a plan as we see record numbers of COVID cases. https://t.co/yUGo7KgWis
Joining @VATeenDems to talk about the election and how important it is to get involved in politics young. Thanks for everything you do to elect Democrats! https://t.co/aoC3ZeH246

Helping kickoff the Network NOVA vote early win virtual GOTV rally with @JenniferWexton and @VoteForBetts . We have 11 days to make a difference. Take a few hours to volunteer for GOTV: https://t.co/7WVboIZ29n #winningistheonlyoption2020 https://t.co/IiodM1uE3N
Have you made your plan to vote yet?  Today at 5 pm is the deadline if you want to apply to vote by mail in Virginia. https://t.co/rM97BLSVh7
What will @realDonaldTrump say to Americans who didn’t vote for him? The same thing he’s been offering up for four years: unhinges rants. #Debates2020
Great to see climate change questions in both debates. #PresidentialDebate2020
The character of the country is on the ballot. Go to https://t.co/3SBP22Tbba and make your plan to vote today. #Debates2020
Our border is stronger than it has ever been because no one wants to come here thanks to @realDonaldTrump and his Covid response. #Debates2020
Every American should make $15 an hour. I was proud to vote for it in Congress and I look forward to watching President Biden sign it into law. #Debates2020
Could @realDonaldTrump name all 50 states? #Debates2020
.@JoeBiden is running to be President of all Americans. @realDonaldTrump tried to kill federal aid to blue states and blue cities. It’s that simple. #Debates2020
Finally @realDonaldTrump addresses the issue Americans are most concerned about: how long @JoeBiden lived in Scranton. #Debates2020

.@JoeBiden is right: @realDonaldTrump ‘s plan to withhold payroll taxes is a threat to Social Security and to the military and federal employees he’s using as guinea pigs. That’s why I’ve introduce legislation to let them opt out of Trump’a scheme. #Debates2020
The weirdest Trump tic is where he randomly breaks into punditry mid-debate. #Debates2020
.@JoeBiden will protect coverage for people with pre-existing conditions. @realDonaldTrump says you’re on your own. It’s that simple. #Debates2020

.@realDonaldTrump seemed genuinely confused to learn that the $28 billion “he” gave to farmers was from taxpayers. Which makes sense because he’s genuinely confused about the concept of paying taxes. #Debates2020
Mocking middle class families is a bold strategy Donald let’s see if it pays off. #Debates2020
.@realDonaldTrump has spent every day profiting from the Presidency in violation of the Emoluments Clause. #Debates2020
Was that @AlecBaldwin doing Trump meets Glenngarry Glenn Ross on how to make a fundraising pitch? #Debates2020
.@realDonaldTrump is telling the truth for once as he lists the disaster facing America because of his inept handling of COVID. #Debates2020
The House passed the HEROES Act five months ago but @realDonaldTrump is too busy play golf to get American families the relief they need. #Debates2020
Is @realDonaldTrump bragging about many people he gave COVID too? #PresidentialDebate2020
Trump is listing the spikes in COVID. Forgot the one he caused in DC. #PresidentialDebate2020
The littlest members of Team Connolly are ready to cheer on @joebiden. Excited to see who babbles more tonight: the one-year old or @realDonaldTrump. #PresidentialDebate2020 https://t.co/z8Vm85KFSs

We have 12 days left to get out the vote for @JoeBiden @KamalaHarris @MarkWarnerVA and our whole Democratic ticket. You can help by phone banking and reminding people to vote early this Saturday. https://t.co/7WVboIZ29n

Starting today there are 8 early voting locations in Prince William County. You can vote early or return your mail absentee ballot at any of them. Find the location hours and make your plan to vote at https://t.co/3SBP22Tbba
Proud to join my friend and constituent @guzman4virginia for her 3rd annual Hispanic Heritage Month Gala. https://t.co/FGxl7ZHRuU

It’s always an honor to see my name on the ballot. Today I proudly cast my vote for @JoeBiden and @MarkWarnerVA . There are 14 early vote locations and drop boxes across Fairfax County. Make your plan to vote! https://t.co/Ye43kkg6Ho
Starting today there are 14 places in Fairfax to vote or return your absentee ballot. Find hours and locations here: https://t.co/b2Xj2mIErl https://t.co/wgeKtsQl6v

Great news in #VA05 .  https://t.co/uhYppTEFvU  @DrCameronWebb is one of the best candidates in the country and needs your help to keep spreading his positive message.  https://t.co/LeYf23hdbh

GMU the Voter Registration deadline in VA is coming up on October 13th   Have you moved? Even if just down the street click the link below to check or update your registration ⬇️ #GoVoteVA https://t.co/revZXh7R2y

Great to join so many high school Democrats from Woodson and Fairfax. Remember if you’re going to be 18 before 11/3 you can vote in this election. The deadline to register in VA is Tuesday at 5 pm. It just takes a few minutes to register: https://t.co/3SBP22Tbba. https://t.co/CadEGSejYd
.@Mike_Pence and @realDonaldTrump are fighting in courthouses every day to make sure people can’t vote. #VPDebate
I for one could do with a lot fewer lectures on racism by a white man to a woman of color. #VPDebate
See after @realDonaldTrump said nice things about white supremacists he also said bad things about them. #VPDebate
Here’s how you know @KamalaHarris is telling the truth: @mike_pence is saying not true. #VPDebate
Why are we not all talking about the fly on @Mike_Pence
The house passed the George Floyd Justice in Policing Act three months ago. It’s sat on Mitch McConnell’s desk while he confirms more right -wing judges. #VPDebate
What happened the 28th time someone nominated a justice in an election year @Mike_Pence ?
Amy Coney Barrett has already questioned the constitutionally of the ACA. Your coverage for pre-existing conditions is on the ballot in November. #VPDebate
It’s not slander if it’s true. #VPDebate
How much of @Mike_Pence debate prep consists of mastering the head shake while hearing a true statement about the horror of @realDonaldTrump ? #VPDebate
America has never been less respected abroad than it is right now. On January 20th @JoeBiden will start rebuilding our relationships and regaining respect. #VPDebate
.@JoeBiden saved the auto industry. @mike_pence voted no. Easy choice. Go to https://t.co/3SBP22Tbba and make your plan to vote.
Donald Trump’s America: farmers who can’t sell their crops and a manufacturing recession. I thought trade wars are easy to win? #VPDebate
The first step in trusting science is putting it on your website. #VPDebate
.@realDonaldTrump has made it clear what he wants to do about climate change: nothing. #VPDebate2020

Until the ACA people with pre-existing conditions could be permanently denied health insurance. @Mike_Pence voted no. @realDonaldTrump is suing to get it thrown out. Easy choice for the American people. #VPDebate
.@BarackObama and @JoeBiden handed over the longest streak of job creation in American history. @realDonaldTrump and @Mike_Pence squandered it. #VPDebate
I was proud to oppose the Republican Tax Scam and look forward to working with @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris to use that money to invest in the American people. #VPDebate
Mike Pence is right about one thing — @realDonaldTrump is a businessman.  He just happens to be a businessman whose sole skill seems to be running his ventures into the ground. #VPDebate
The president could clear up how much he’s paid in income taxes by... releasing them. #VPDebate
The American people do have a right to know about the health of our President. So when was the last time @realDonaldTrump tested negative for COVID? #VPDebate
You want to know what actually undermines public health? Telling people to drink bleach inject themselves with Lysol. #VPDebate
Only one person is playing politics with people’s lives and it’s the guy who did an infomercial for an unproven treatment today.
The American people have sacrificed so much because today the incompetence of this administration. Straight fire and the honest truth from @KamalaHarris !
What the American people have done these last 8 months is remarkable. What @realDonaldTrump has done is an embarrassment.
30 seconds into the debate and mike pence is already breaking out his patented shaking his head in denial of basic facts.
Georgia you have a chance to have a decent human being to represent you in the Senate. Go to https://t.co/3SBP22Tbba and make a plan to vote for @ReverendWarnock . https://t.co/IZqTnZguI0
The @gop is a death cult https://t.co/P46PJArGW7

Joining my colleagues @DonBeyerVA and @BobbyScott4VA3 to support @DrCameronWebb tonight. Can you make a donation for the closest race in VA today? https://t.co/l892mGEVMv
Donald Trump knows if you vote and your vote is counted he is going to lose in a landslide.
A good reminder from @JoeBiden to visit https://t.co/3SBP22Tbba and make your plan to vote.
Trump is really struggling to remember things he’s said and that his closest advisors have said. Odd.
I was proud to support the Paris Climate Accord and look forward to working with @JoeBiden to rejoin and implement it.
Watching Trump in this debate convinced me he should have taken that drug test. Manic intrusive and disconnected. God let this end soon.
Once again on an issue threatening our nation Trump doesn’t have a plan.
Finally a presidential debate question on climate change.
Obama/Biden fixed it. Trump broke it.
One thing @realDonaldTrump and I can agree on: he shouldn’t be allowed to run a hotel on government property.
Show us the tax returns @realDonaldTrump
Donald Trump admits it’s a sad thing that’s happening to this country. In 5 weeks we can start healing again.
PSA: wear a mask.
Trump is a disgrace
I can’t believe @realDonaldTrump just promised he could deliver a vaccine to all Americans as soon as it was ready. Blatant lie.
It’s been 4 months since the House passed the HEROES act. If Joe Biden were president Americans would already have the relief they need.
It is what is because you are who you are. Biden is right. Trump has no plan.
Simple choice for the American people. Donald Trump wants to end protections for 100 million Americans with pre-existing conditions. @JoeBiden will protect them.

We’ve got a great opportunity to flip #VA05 and elect @DrCameronWebb. This is one of the closest races in the country and I’ll be joining a great lineup of VA leaders tomorrow for a virtual fundraiser. You can sign up here to join us: https://t.co/jmUUTf9Dcs

Last night we lost an icon. Justice Ginsburg dedicated her life to fighting for equality under the law for all Americans regardless of gender race or sexual orientation. McConnell must follow his own precedent and allow the next President to fill this seat.

. @DrCameronWebb is building a campaign on consensus building and bipartisan leadership that is breaking through in the 5th district. Cook Political moved the race to Tossup this morning. Help him flip the seat in November >> https://t.co/eJgyPQ89dy

The @GLFOP has shown itself for the partisan reactionary ideological thing it really is. It is a threatening  presence amidst us.

To endorse someone who foments violence and traffics in racial division especially after George Floyd and Brianna Taylor and Jason Blake is repugnant. Especially when you’re ostensibly committed to de-escalate and protect and serve our communities.

The largest police union in the country—@GLFOP —has endorsed Trump for re-election. If Americans needed further proof of the problem of structural racism and reactionary ideology in law enforcement this is it.

In 2016 the presidential debates had ZERO questions about climate change. This issue can’t be ignored again. I’ve joined 70 lawmakers demanding @debates make climate change a focus this year. Read the letter here: https://t.co/Md8CHPjYU4

It’s #NationalPollWorkerRecruitmentDay . If you’re healthy and able to help it’s a great way to make a difference in your community and help our democracy function. In Virginia you even get paid! Learn more about how to sign up: https://t.co/qS8DajI8jb
Great to join @PWCDems to talk about the postal service and the election. https://t.co/O2bu2yPv8S
.@EdMarkey is the right man for the job and he has a record to prove it.  I'm proud to join @AOC and so many others in endorsing our friend and my former colleague Ed Markey. https://t.co/JlodS6azRl
than ever. I’m proud to endorse @EdMarkey for renomination and urge my friends and relatives in the Bay State to cast their votes for him.

For me that choice is @EdMarkey. His vision eclipsed most of his peers on the environment energy telecommunications health care and consumer protections. And his legislative record is unrivaled. At this juncture in our history we need his skills his vision and leadership more

Elections enable voters to weigh the merits of candidates and measure values experience vision and competence against their own expectations and aspirations. Next week’s primary for US Senate affords my native state of Massachusetts a rich choice between two talented candidates
Honored to have the support of my brothers and sisters in organized labor and the endorsement of @Virginia_AFLCIO .

Tonight Barak Obama gave an extraordinary out of the ballpark speech about American democracy —weaknesses and strengths—and what it means to be an American. He eviscerated Trump and issued the most powerful call to action in modern electoral history. Bravura.

How a real President acts. https://t.co/G4vUSkCSI1

She's held Trump accountable and led the fight against his right-wing nominees on the Judiciary committee. I can't wait to campaign virtually with them both and help deliver Virginia for the Democratic ticket for a fourth consecutive election.

@JoeBiden made a wise and historic choice today by picking @KamalaHarris as his running mate. She has the experience to serve as Vice President on day one and has a record of delivering progressive results  for working families in California and in the Senate.
